processing_notes: Source states: 'Botswana (23 cases, three deaths) were the two countries with the lowest burdens, with two outbreaks reported each during this period (online supplemental table 2)' - interpreted as 23 suspected cases over 2000-2023 period

Source states: 'Botswana has recorded 55 suspected cases of cholera. Of the suspected cases, 15 have been confirmed as cholera resulting in two deaths so far' - interpreted as 55 suspected and 15 confirmed cases in March 2009

Source states: 'Between 8th and 19th October 2018, the NHL cultured 22 stool specimens and all the specimens were negative for Vibrio cholerae. No suspected cholera cases have been detected in Botswana in recent times' - validated zero cholera transmission during laboratory investigation

Source states: 'Botswana health authorities said Monday that a suspected cholera case reported in Francistown last week has tested negative. Confirmatory tests at the National Health Laboratory came out negative' - validated zero cholera transmission during first suspected case investigation
